name: Addis Ababa Bole International Airport
description: The main international gateway to Ethiopia

review.description: Nice airport, good service

name: National Museum of Ethiopia
description: Museum showcasing Ethiopian history, art & culture, including Lucy, the 3.2 million-year-old hominid

review.description: Great museum, lots of interesting exhibits

name: Mercato
description: One of the largest open-air markets in Africa, with vendors selling a wide range of goods

review.description: Colorful market, lots of things to see

name: Danakil Depression
description: One of the hottest and driest places on Earth, Danakil Depression is known for its colorful hydrothermal fields, acid ponds and salt formations.

review.description: A must-visit place for anyone visiting Afar region.

name: Erta Ale
description: Erta Ale is an active shield volcano in the Afar Region of northeastern Ethiopia, known for its lava lake.

review.description: Amazing natural wonder, but requires a challenging hike to reach.

name: Asayta
description: A historical town in the Afar Region known for its ancient ruins and the nearby Asayta Salt Pans.

review.description: Interesting historical site, but not much else to do in the area.

name: Lake Tana
description: The largest lake in Ethiopia and the source of the Blue Nile river.

review.description: Beautiful lake with scenic views.

name: Blue Nile Falls
description: A waterfall on the Blue Nile river, with a height of about 45 meters.

review.description: Spectacular waterfall with amazing views.

name: Addis Ababa University
description: A renowned university located in Addis Ababa.

review.description: A great institution of higher learning.

name: Bezawit Hill
description: A scenic viewpoint in Bahir Dar that offers views of the city and Lake Tana.

review.description: Great place to take in the views of Bahir Dar.

name: Tis Abay Bridge
description: A bridge that crosses the Blue Nile river near the Blue Nile Falls.

review.description: Interesting engineering feat, but not much else to see.

name: Nech Sar National Park
description: A national park with a variety of wildlife and scenic views.

review.description: Great place to see animals in their natural habitat!

name: Arbaminch Zuria
description: A district with many coffee farms and beautiful landscapes.

review.description: Lovely views of the countryside and a great place to taste local coffee!

name: Dorze Village
description: A traditional village famous for its weaving and unique architecture.

review.description: Fascinating to see the local culture and crafts up close!

name: Lake Chamo
description: A large lake known for its crocodiles and hippos.

review.description: Great boat tour with amazing wildlife sightings!

name: Crocodile Ranch
description: A farm that raises and sells crocodiles and crocodile products.

review.description: Interesting to learn about crocodile farming and see the animals up close!

name: Simien Mountains National Park
description: A UNESCO World Heritage Site known for its dramatic landscapes, unique wildlife, and hiking trails.

review.description: Breathtaking views and incredible biodiversity!

name: Lalibela
description: A town famous for its rock-hewn churches, considered one of the holiest sites in Ethiopia.

review.description: Incredible architectural and historical significance!

name: Gonder
description: An ancient royal city known for its well-preserved castles and palaces.

review.description: Rich history and impressive architecture!

name: Lake Awasa
description: A scenic lake popular for boating, bird-watching, and fishing.

review.description: Relaxing atmosphere and abundant birdlife!

name: Omo Valley
description: A culturally diverse region known for its indigenous tribes and traditional customs.

review.description: Fascinating cultural experiences and unique tribal traditions!
